project.title: 2020 Â· Leveraging technology for sexual desire
project.intro: Couples (especially millennials) are experiencing low sexual desire and activity, and I wanted to investigate why this is and how technology could be of support. Through conducting a survey and participatory design sessions, I created a low-fidelity prototype of a conceptual solution: Muse, an app that provides inspiration and suggestions based on preferences and background information, and spontaneously prompts users with questions, adventures, and tips and tricks. *I conducted this project as part of my dissertation when studying HCI at UCL, which was awarded with a distinction.

project.team: Individual university project under supervision Dr. Aneesha Singh and PhD. Dilisha Patel.
project.role: Conducting primary and secondary research, exploring ideas through participatory design sessions, creating low-fidelity prototypes and reviewing.
